sinister_halo.name: Sinister Halo
sinister_halo.desc: Emit a spinning halo of celestial energy, trapping and shredding all caught within its wake.

celestial_assault.name: Celestial Assault
celestial_assault.desc: Use your wings and deliver two critical blows.

ascension.name: Ascension
ascension.desc: Take to the skies for a devastating strike.
